info.name: theHomeBrewAPI
info.description: Collection of calls used to test the homebrew api.

item.name: Post Recipe (including ingredient with long name)
Post Recipe (including ingredient with invalid amount)
Put Recipe (including ingredient with long name)
Put Recipe (including ingredient with invalid amount)
Patch Recipe (add step to end of array)
Patch Recipe (insert step at valid index)
Patch Recipe (insert step at invalid index)
Patch Recipe (replace step at invalid index)
Patch Recipe (remove step at invalid index)
Post Ingredient (long name, missing amount, invalid property)
Patch Water Profile (replace name and description)
Patch Water Profile (add addition to end of array)
Patch Water Profile (insert addition at valid index)
Patch Water Profile (insert addition at invalid index)
Patch Water Profile (replace addition at invalid index)
Patch Water Profile (remove addition at invalid index)

body.raw:
{
    "name": "updated brew",
    "recipeId": "2",
    "brewDate": "2021-01-15",
    "brewedState": "1",
    "brewingNotes": "Amended brewing notes",
    "aBV": "5.1",
    "rating": "4",
    "tastingNotes": [
        { "note": "Tasting note 1", "date": "2021-01-14" },
        { "note": "Tasting note 2", "date": "2021-01-16" },
        { "note": "Tasting note 3", "date": "2021-01-17" }
    ]
}

item.name: Patch Brew (replace name and brew date)
Patch Brew (replace name, brew date and state)
Patch Brew (replace name, brew date, state, notes)
Patch Brew (replace name, brew date, state, notes, ABV)
Patch Brew (replace name, brew date, state, notes, ABV, rating)
Patch Brew (replace name, brew date, state, notes, ABV, rating, recipe ID)
Patch Brew (add tasting note to end of array)
Patch Brew (insert tasting note at valid index)
Patch Brew (insert tasting note at invalid index)
Patch Brew (replace tasting note at invalid index)
Patch Brew (remove tasting note at invalid index)
